lesson_list.title: Pinyin - 声母
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the initial consonants (shengmu) in Mandarin Chinese.

lesson_list.title: Pinyin - 韵母
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the final vowels (yunmu) in Mandarin Chinese.

lesson_list.title: Pinyin - 声调
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the tones (shengdiao) in Mandarin Chinese.

lesson_list.title: 汉字 - 基本笔画
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the basic strokes (jiben bihua) in Chinese characters.

lesson_list.title: 汉字 - 常用部首
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn the commonly used radical components (changyong bushou) in Chinese characters.

lesson_list.title: 汉字 - 常用词汇
lesson_list.subtitle: Learn commonly used vocabulary (changyong cihui) in Mandarin Chinese.
